snippet: Carne en vara, beef on a stick cooked over a fire, served bloody and without utensils, is dining at its finest.
abstract: William Neuman article describes experience of eating carne en vara, beef on stick cooked over fire that is served bloody, in Venezuela.
lead_paragraph: Carne en vara, beef on a stick cooked over a fire, served bloody and without utensils, is dining at its finest.
